verses.text: Now \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Izhar|strong="H3324"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, and \w Dathan|strong="H1885"\w* and \w Abiram|strong="H0048"\w*, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Eliab|strong="H0446"\w*, and \w On|strong="H0203"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Peleth|strong="H6431"\w*, \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*, \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \add men:\add*

And they rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, with \w certain|strong="H0582"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w assembly|strong="H5712"\w*, \w famous|strong="H7148"\w* in the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w renown|strong="H8034"\w*:

And they gathered themselves \w together|strong="H6950"\w* against \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and against \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \add Ye take\add* too \w much|strong="H7227"\w* upon you, seeing all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \add are\add* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*, every one of them, and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* them: wherefore then lift ye \w up|strong="H5375"\w* yourselves above the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*?  +  r 16.3  t Ye take…: Heb. It is much for you *
And when \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add it\add*, he \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* upon his \w face|strong="H6440"\w*:

And he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w* and unto all his \w company|strong="H5712"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Even to \w morrow|strong="H1242"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w shew|strong="H3045"\w* who \add are\add* his, and \add who is\add* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*; and will cause \add him\add* to come \w near|strong="H7126"\w* unto him: even \add him\add* whom he hath \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* will he cause to come \w near|strong="H7126"\w* unto him.
This \w do|strong="H6213"\w*; \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* you \w censers|strong="H4289"\w*, \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w*, and all his \w company|strong="H5712"\w*;

And \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w therein|strong="H2004"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* in them \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* to \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w*: and it shall be \add that\add* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* whom the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* doth \w choose|strong="H0977"\w*, he \add shall be\add* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*: \add ye take\add* too \w much|strong="H7227"\w* upon you, ye \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*.
And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w*, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, I pray you, ye \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*:

\add Seemeth it but\add* a small \w thing|strong="H4592"\w* unto you, that the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* hath \w separated|strong="H0914"\w* you from the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, to bring you \w near|strong="H7126"\w* to himself to \w do|strong="H5647"\w* the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and to \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* to \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* unto them?

And he hath brought thee \w near|strong="H7126"\w* \add to him\add*, and all thy \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w* with thee: and \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* ye the \w priesthood|strong="H3550"\w* also?

For which \w cause|strong="H3651"\w* \add both\add* thou and all thy \w company|strong="H5712"\w* \add are\add* gathered \w together|strong="H3259"\w* against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and what \add is\add* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, that ye \w murmur|strong="H3885"\w* against him?

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w Dathan|strong="H1885"\w* and \w Abiram|strong="H0048"\w*, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Eliab|strong="H0446"\w*: which \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, We will not come \w up|strong="H5927"\w*:

\add Is it\add* a small \w thing|strong="H4592"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast brought us \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* that \w floweth|strong="H2100"\w* with \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* and \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*, to \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* us in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, except thou \w make|strong="H8323"\w* thyself \w altogether|strong="H8323"\w* a \w prince|strong="H8323"\w* over us?

\w Moreover|strong="H0637"\w* thou hast not \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* us into a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* that \w floweth|strong="H2100"\w* with \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* and \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*, or \w given|strong="H5414"\w* us \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* of \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* and \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*: wilt thou put \w out|strong="H5365"\w* the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of these \w men|strong="H0582"\w*? we will not come \w up|strong="H5927"\w*.\f + \fr 16.14 \ft put…: Heb. bore out\f*

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* was \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w wroth|strong="H2734"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w Respect|strong="H6437"\w* not thou their \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*: I have not \w taken|strong="H5375"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w ass|strong="H2543"\w* from them, neither have I \w hurt|strong="H7489"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of them.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w*, Be thou and all thy \w company|strong="H5712"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, thou, and they, and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, to \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w*:

And \w take|strong="H3947"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w censer|strong="H4289"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* in them, and \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* ye \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w censer|strong="H4289"\w*, two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w censers|strong="H4289"\w*; thou also, and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w each|strong="H0376"\w* \add of you\add* his \w censer|strong="H4289"\w*.

And they \w took|strong="H3947"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w censer|strong="H4289"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* in them, and \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* thereon, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* in the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w* with \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*.

And \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6950"\w* all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* against them unto the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*: and the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* unto all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*.
And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,
\w Separate|strong="H0914"\w* yourselves from \w among|strong="H8432"\w* this \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*, that I may \w consume|strong="H3615"\w* them in a \w moment|strong="H7281"\w*.

And they \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* upon their \w faces|strong="H6440"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w spirits|strong="H7307"\w* of all \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, shall \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*, and wilt thou be \w wroth|strong="H7107"\w* with all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*?
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Get you \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from \w about|strong="H5439"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* of \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w*, \w Dathan|strong="H1885"\w*, and \w Abiram|strong="H0048"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* unto \w Dathan|strong="H1885"\w* and \w Abiram|strong="H0048"\w*; and the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w followed|strong="H3212"\w* \w him|strong="H0310"\w*.

And he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Depart|strong="H5493"\w*, I pray you, from the \w tents|strong="H0168"\w* of these \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, and \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* nothing of theirs, lest ye be \w consumed|strong="H5595"\w* in all their \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*.

So they gat \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* of \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w*, \w Dathan|strong="H1885"\w*, and \w Abiram|strong="H0048"\w*, on every \w side|strong="H5439"\w*: and \w Dathan|strong="H1885"\w* and \w Abiram|strong="H0048"\w* came \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5324"\w* in the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of their \w tents|strong="H0168"\w*, and their \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, and their \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and their little \w children|strong="H2945"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Hereby ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* me to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* all these \w works|strong="H4639"\w*; for \add I have\add* not \add done them\add* of mine own \w mind|strong="H3820"\w*.

If these men \w die|strong="H4191"\w* the common \w death|strong="H4194"\w* of all \w men|strong="H0120"\w*, or if they be \w visited|strong="H6485"\w* after the \w visitation|strong="H6486"\w* of all \w men|strong="H0120"\w*; \add then\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath not \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* me.\f + \fr 16.29 \ft the common…: Heb. as every man dieth\f*

But if the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w make|strong="H1254"\w* a new \w thing|strong="H1278"\w*, and the \w earth|strong="H0127"\w* \w open|strong="H6475"\w* her \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and swallow them \w up|strong="H1104"\w*, with all that \add appertain\add* unto them, and they go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w quick|strong="H2416"\w* into the \w pit|strong="H7585"\w*; then ye shall \w understand|strong="H3045"\w* that these \w men|strong="H0582"\w* have \w provoked|strong="H5006"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.  +  r 16.30  t make…: Heb. create a creature *

¶ And it came to pass, as he had made an \w end|strong="H3615"\w* of \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* all these \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, that the \w ground|strong="H0127"\w* clave \w asunder|strong="H1234"\w* that \add was\add* under them:

And the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* her \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and swallowed them \w up|strong="H1104"\w*, and their \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, and all the \w men|strong="H0120"\w* that \add appertained\add* unto \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w*, and all \add their\add* \w goods|strong="H7399"\w*.

They, and all that \add appertained\add* to them, went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w* into the \w pit|strong="H7585"\w*, and the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w closed|strong="H3680"\w* upon them: and they \w perished|strong="H0006"\w* from \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w*.

And all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* that \add were\add* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* them \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* at the \w cry|strong="H6963"\w* of them: for they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Lest the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* swallow us \w up|strong="H1104"\w* \add also\add*.

And there came \w out|strong="H3318"\w* a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w consumed|strong="H0398"\w* the two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* that \w offered|strong="H7126"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w*.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, that he take \w up|strong="H7311"\w* the \w censers|strong="H4289"\w* \w out|strong="H0996"\w* of the \w burning|strong="H8316"\w*, and \w scatter|strong="H2219"\w* thou the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w yonder|strong="H1973"\w*; for they are \w hallowed|strong="H6942"\w*.

The \w censers|strong="H4289"\w* of these \w sinners|strong="H2400"\w* against their own \w souls|strong="H5315"\w*, let them \w make|strong="H6213"\w* them \w broad|strong="H7555"\w* \w plates|strong="H6341"\w* \add for\add* a \w covering|strong="H6826"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*: for they \w offered|strong="H7126"\w* them \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, therefore they are \w hallowed|strong="H6942"\w*: and they shall be a \w sign|strong="H0226"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w brasen|strong="H5178"\w* \w censers|strong="H4289"\w*, wherewith they that were \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* had \w offered|strong="H7126"\w*; and they were made \w broad|strong="H7554"\w* \add plates for\add* a \w covering|strong="H6826"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*:

\add To be\add* a \w memorial|strong="H2146"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* no \w stranger|strong="H0376"\w*, which \add is\add* not of the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, come \w near|strong="H7126"\w* to \w offer|strong="H6999"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; that he be not as \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w*, and as his \w company|strong="H5712"\w*: as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* to him by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

¶ But on the \w morrow|strong="H4283"\w* all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w murmured|strong="H3885"\w* against \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and against \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Ye have \w killed|strong="H4191"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And it came to pass, when the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* was \w gathered|strong="H6950"\w* against \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and against \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, that they \w looked|strong="H6437"\w* toward the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*: and, behold, the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* it, and the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w*.
And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Get you \w up|strong="H7426"\w* from \w among|strong="H8432"\w* this \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*, that I may \w consume|strong="H3615"\w* them as in a \w moment|strong="H7281"\w*. And they \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* upon their \w faces|strong="H6440"\w*.

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* a \w censer|strong="H4289"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* therein from \w off|strong="H6440"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* on \w incense|strong="H7004"\w*, and \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w quickly|strong="H4120"\w* unto the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*, and make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for them: for there is \w wrath|strong="H7110"\w* gone \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; the \w plague|strong="H5063"\w* is \w begun|strong="H2490"\w*.

And \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* as \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w commanded|strong="H1696"\w*, and \w ran|strong="H7323"\w* into the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w*; and, behold, the \w plague|strong="H5063"\w* was \w begun|strong="H2490"\w* among the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: and he \w put|strong="H5414"\w* on \w incense|strong="H7004"\w*, and made an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.
And he \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* between the \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* and the \w living|strong="H2416"\w*; and the \w plague|strong="H4046"\w* was \w stayed|strong="H6113"\w*.

Now they that \w died|strong="H4191"\w* in the \w plague|strong="H4046"\w* were \w fourteen|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*, beside them that \w died|strong="H4191"\w* about the \w matter|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w*.

And \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* unto the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*: and the \w plague|strong="H4046"\w* was \w stayed|strong="H6113"\w*.
